name: CallRemoteFunction
warnings: CallRemoteFunction crashes the server if it's passing an empty string.
description: Calls a public function in any script that is loaded.

params_body.name: {Float,_}:...
params_body.description: 'Indefinite' number of arguments of any tag

return_values: The value that the last public function returned.
related_fn: CallLocalFunction: Call a function in the script.
